gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਤੇ ਅਪਨਾ ਨਾਮੁ ਜਪਾਯੋ || ਸਤਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਕਾਹੂੰ ਨ ਦ੍ਰਿੜਾਯੋ ||੨੭||
transliteration: Sabh Te Apnaa Naam(u) Japaayo|| Sat(i) Naam Kaahoon Na Dridaayo||27||
translation: He caused all to utter his name and did not give True Name of the Lord with firmness to anyone.27.

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਅਪਨੀ ਅਪਨੀ ੳੁਰਝਾਨਾ || ਪਾਰਬ੍ਹਮ ਕਾਹੂ ਨ ਪਛਾਨਾ ||
transliteration: Sabh Apniapniurjhaanaa|| Paarbhaanaa Kaahoo Na Pachhaadaa||
translation: Everyone placed his own interest first and foremost and did not comprehend the Supreme Brahman.

gurmukhi: ਤਪ ਸਾਧਤ ਹਰਿ ਮੋਹਿ ਬੁਲਾਯੋ || ੲਿਮ ਕਹਿ ਕੈ ੲਿਹ ਲੋਕ ਪਠਾਯੋ ||੨੮||
transliteration: Tap Saadhat Har(i) Moh(i) Bulaayo|| Im Kah(i) Kai Eh Lok Pathaayo||28||
translation: When I was busy in the austere devotion, the Lord called me and sent me to this world with the following words.28.
The Word of the Non-Temporal Lord:

gurmukhi: ਮੈ ਅਪਨਾ ਸੁਤ ਤੋਹਿ ਨਿਵਾਜਾ || ਪੰਥ ਪ੍ਰਚੁਰ ਕਰਬੇ ਕਹੁ ਸਾਜਾ ||
transliteration: Mai Apnaa Sout Tohe Nivaajaa|| Panth Prachur Karbe Kauh Saajaa||
translation: I have adopted you as my son and hath created you for the propagation of the path (Panth).

gurmukhi: ਜਾਹਿ ਤਹਾਂ ਤੈ ਧਰਮੁ ਚਲਾੲਿ || ਕਬੁਧਿ ਕਰਨ ਤੇ ਲੋਕ ਹਟਾੲਿ ||੨੯||
transliteration: Jaah(i) Tahaan Tai Dharam(u) Chadhaae|| Kabudh(i) Karan Te Lok Hataae||29||
translation: “You go therefore for the spread of Dharma (righteousness) and cause people to retrace their steps from evil actions”.29.

gurmukhi: ਠਾਢ ਭਯੋ ਮੈ ਜੋਰਿ ਕਰਿ; ਬਚਨ ਕਹਾ ਸਿਰ ਨਿਅਾੲਿ ||
transliteration: Thaadh Bhayo Mai Jor(i) Kar Bachanndkahaasir Niaae||
translation: I stood up with folded hands and bowing down my head, I said:

gurmukhi: ਪੰਥ ਚਲੈ ਤਬ ਜਗਤ ਮੈ; ਜਬ ਤੁਮ ਕਰਹੁ ਸਹਾੲਿ ||੧||
transliteration: Panth Chalai Tab Jagad Mai Jab Toumdaroh Sahaae||30||
translation: “The path (Panth) shall prevail only in the world, with THY ASSISTANCE.”30.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਹ ਕਾਰਨਿ ਪ੍ਰਭ ਮੋਹਿ ਪਠਾਯੋ || ਤਬ ਮੈ ਜਗਤ ਜਨਮ ਧਰਿ ਅਾਯੋ ||
transliteration: Ih Karan(i) Prabh Moh(i) Pathaayo|| Tab Mai Jagad Janam Dhar(i) Aayo||
translation: For this reason the Lord sent me and I was born in this world.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਮ ਤਿਨ ਕਹੀ ਤਿਨੈ ਤਿਮ ਕਹਿਹੋਂ || ਅੳੁਰ ਕਿਸੂ ਤੇ ਬੈਰ ਨ ਗਹਿਹੋਂ ||੩੧||
transliteration: Jim Tin Kahoo Tinai Tim Kahihon|| Aur Kisoo Te Bair Na Gadihon||31||
translation: Whatever the Lord said, I am repeating the same unto you, I do not bear enmity with anyone.31.
